pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inference for Spatiotemporal Partially Observed Markov Processes // Inference on panel data using spatiotemporal partially- observed Markov process (SpatPOMP) models. To do so, it relies on and extends a number of facilities that the 'pomp' package provides for inference on time series data using partially- observed Markov process (POMP) models. Implemented methods include filtering and inference methods in Park and Ionides (2020) doi:10.1007/s11222-020-09957-3, Rebeschini and van Handel (2015) doi:10.1214/14-AAP1061, Evensen and van Leeuwen (1996) doi:10.1029/94JC00572, Ionides et al. (2021) doi:10.1080/01621459.2021.1974867, Ionides, Ning and Wheeler (2022) doi:10.5705/ss.202022.0188, Ning and Ionides (2023) arXiv:2110.10745. Pre-print statistical software article: Asfaw et al. (2021) arXiv:2101.01157.
